properties.name: Cabo San Lucas trip
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81Had the greatest time in Mexico!! Partied with him and his friends. Thank goodness for his Spanish skills! haha. We got caught doing our thing at a lounge. OOPS!

properties.name: Governmental Accounting National Meeting
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81This was a business trip. We "coincidently" booked the same hotel. We snuck into each other\'s room...but we acted very professional at the seminars. If only colleagues knew....

properties.name: He was in Chicago, I was in Denver.
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81653 W. 63rd StreetWe talked for hours and had phone @##$%. We also made plans for me to get a room by LAX where we can finally see each other after weeks

properties.name: His Work.  One of the  many places where we secretly met.
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81

properties.name: I met up with him in Seattle for four days. We did some shopping, ate at good restaurants and freezed our asses off.
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81Â

properties.name: I was in Denver, he was in Chicago.
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81Denver, CoWe talked for hours and had phone @##$%. We were thinking of meeting in Texas since that will be the next field work. But we couldn\'t wait. After his Illinois trip, he would come home for a few days. So... We made plans for me to get a room by LAX where we can finally see each other after weeks.

properties.name: New Orleans.
properties.description: Posted by Jquest812020 sumpter new orleansHe was conducting an audit over there, and he bought my ticket to keep him company over the weekend. Visit a few places, but we were just too busy for each other.

properties.name: Steve...if youre reading this...
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81los angeles, caIt just proves my point that it\'s perfectly normal to look through your significant other\'s web pages especially when it\'s posted to the public. I\'m pretty sure you couldn\'t help yourself from reading this information on this map. Understand why I did what I did. You shouldn\'t STILL be mad at me for reading your personal map with you and your ex. Now you have seen my map with my ex...after you mentioned that you wouldn\'t bother looking at it...how does that feel?

properties.name: Turning point in our relationship
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81new york city, new yorkI broke up with my boyfriend. I flew to NYC to see him. I surprised him at his hotel room. We were so happy to see each other. We spent 5 days sight seeing, eating, drinking, partying, and we watched the Producers. We went to Central Park and talked about how we first met...and here I was with him in the middle of Central Park.

properties.name: Went to San Juan, Puerto Rico
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81LOVED IT!! We stayed at the Ritz Carlton, had plenty of drinks, we soaked up the sun...it was great!

properties.name: Where we first met.  At work.
properties.description: Posted by Jquest81The first time I saw him was when he walked into the accounting department, meeting one of the managers to conduct an audit for one of our units. I clearly remember everything about him when I first saw him. He was tall, dark, and handsome w/ hazel eyes. He was the one that came up to me to talk to me, and he asked me out. It was a great feeling and I knew I had to see him again after he completed his field work.
